ygData.subject: RE: Level 43 song - Desperate Dirge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... hmm nope, like any damaging magic in the game (on the regular non-pvp servers anyways) you cannot harm other players with it unless you are dueling. So far
ygData.messageBody:
>So what you are saying is that if you target a mob standing right next to
>you and sing this song, you will also take damage. What happens if you
>target a mob from a distance but the rest of your party is standing near
>the
>mob? Will they also take damage?
>
>Gatin of E'ci (who won't have to worry about this issue for quite some
>time)

hmm nope, like any damaging magic in the game (on the regular non-pvp
servers anyways) you cannot harm other players with it unless you are
dueling. So far i've killed myself twice with this song - once because I
didn't know any better, the second time I was lagged to hell and the mob
warped next to me when it hit (ouch).

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
